# Overview

StableGLM delivers Îµ-Rashomon sets for convex ERM GLMs, with fast ellipsoid certificates and exact membership sampling.

- See the {doc}`quickstart <quickstart>` to get started quickly.
- API reference: see {doc}`api/reference <../api/reference>`
- Project milestones: see {doc}`../project_plan`
- Reproducibility notes: see {doc}`../reproducibility`
